articles.title: Polar adds personalized fitness subscription to its smartwatch app, like Garmin's
articles.description: Polar becomes the latest fitness brand to include a subscription-based health plan for its wearables.
articles.content:

Your smartwatch is slowly becoming your personal trainer, thanks to subscription plans that use the biometric data gathered by the watch to create customized training plans.

articles.title: Why Travis Scott, More Tours Stop There
articles.description: India's concert business is seeing big growth, with tours by Travis Scott, Ed Sheeran, Coldplay, Post Malone and more stopping there. Here's why.
articles.content: Delhi, a city of 34 million people, was the obvious setting for Indian pop star Diljit Dosanjh to open his home-country tour last October — and he quickly sold out Jawaharlal Nehru Stadium and added a second date. But after that, Dosanjh wanted to pl... [6533 chars]

articles.content: Microsoft has partnered with Anthropic to develop an official C# SDK for the Model Context Protocol (MCP), an open protocol designed to connect large language models (LLMs) with external tools and data sources. The SDK is open-source and available un... [2431 chars]

articles.title: Google officially rolls out links in AI Overviews to its own search results
articles.description: After testing this for a month, Google officially rolled out this method to help searchers explore more topics.
articles.content:

articles.title: AI models still struggle to debug software, Microsoft study shows
articles.description: Even some of the best AI models today still struggle to debug software, a Microsoft study shows.
